Summary: I got out of my auto to get the mail from the mail box. I was facing East and saw a yellow tinged with white oval shaped object.
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Columbia
There were no other sightings in Columbia on or around October 11th 2007
divs: Sighting Details I stopped at my mail box by the side of the road to collect my mail ,when I had the feeling to look up. I saw this oval shaped object. It was yellow in the center graduating to white at the edges. The object appeared to be about eighteen thousand feet up in the sky ,IT Accelerated slightely then it appeared to implode upon itself. Visability was unlimited. There was not any sound with this incident. The object did not appear to be any type of regular air craft.
